roles.title: Consultant
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Construction Management, or related field
2-5 years of experience in project controls or related field
Experience with project scheduling software (Primavera P6, MS Project)
Knowledge of project management principles and methodologies

roles.title: Senior Consultant
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Construction Management, or related field
7+ years of experience in project controls or related field
Advanced expertise in project controls tools and methodologies
Strong leadership and team management abilities
Proven track record of successful project delivery
Experience with EVMS implementation and oversight

steps.title: Submit Application

steps.description: Phone discussion with our HR team to understand your background and aspirations

steps.title: Technical Interview
steps.description: In-depth discussion with technical team leads about your expertise

steps.title: Final Steps
steps.description: Reference checks and offer discussion upon successful completion
